duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform equipment refreshes for multiple nearby locations, including delivery, setup, and troubleshooting as necessary; imaging desktops and laptops.
Set up peripherals such as printers and new VOIP phone line installations; including moving or changes.
Provide Windows operational support including break/fix, monitoring queue, triaging tickets from ServiceNow, and troubleshooting Windows OS, Office applications, and user issues.
Manage access including security group permissions, assigning IDs, and adding to appropriate email groups.

education_certification.credential: College degree in a related field and familiarity with ITIL Service Desk best practices is preferred.
